meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The ruler measured the pencil in centimetres.
meanings.sent2: She needed a ruler to measure the length of the book in centimetres.
meanings.sent3: The centimetres on the ruler played hide and seek with the inches.
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking was measured in centimetres of flour and sugar.
meanings.sent5: The centimetres on the measuring tape danced as she measured the fabric.
